options.content:
### Re-ID & Cross-Camera Tracking

Person re-identification (Re-ID) enables tracking individuals across multiple camera views using visual appearance features.

**Key Metrics:**
- **Re-ID Match Rate**: Percentage of successful matches. >85% is excellent, 70-85% is acceptable, <70% indicates issues.
- **Re-ID Latency**: Time to compute matches. P95 should stay under 500ms for real-time tracking.
- **Cross-Camera Handoffs**: Successful transitions when a person moves between camera views.

**When matches fail:**
- Significant lighting changes between cameras
- Partial occlusions or different viewing angles
- Clothing changes or similar-looking individuals

panels.title: Zone Dwell Time P95 by Zone

options.content:
### Zone Monitoring

Zones define areas of interest within camera views for targeted monitoring and event detection.

**Key Metrics:**
- **Zone Entries/Exits**: Counts when entities cross zone boundaries (directional line crossing).
- **Zone Intrusions**: Unauthorized entries into restricted zones.
- **Dwell Time**: How long entities stay within a zone.

**Configuration:**
- Zones are configured per camera via the Settings page
- Set dwell time thresholds to trigger loitering alerts
- Line crossing can detect direction (enter/exit)

**Best Practices:**
- Keep zones non-overlapping for accurate counting
- Use separate zones for high-traffic vs restricted areas

panels.description: Action recognition confidence over time by type
panels.title: Confidence by Action Type

options.content:
### Action Recognition

AI-powered detection of specific human actions and behaviors in video feeds.

**Supported Actions:**
- **Loitering**: Person staying in one area longer than threshold
- **Falls**: Sudden vertical movement indicating a fall event
- **Aggression**: Fighting or aggressive physical behavior
- **Running**: Rapid movement that may indicate urgency

**Confidence Interpretation:**
- >80%: High confidence, likely accurate detection
- 60-80%: Moderate confidence, review recommended
- <60%: Low confidence, may be false positive

**Reducing False Positives:**
- Adjust minimum confidence thresholds per action type
- Configure excluded zones where certain actions are normal
